name: Nomod
headline: The payment links app to sell anything, anywhere
description: Nomod is a financial services software business based in London. Our payment processing apps replace legacy card terminals allowing merchants to process in-person and online payments on their iOS or Android device with no extra hardware. Our differentiated approach directly serves the merchant and scales rapidly across geographies and verticals.

founders.name: Omar Kassim, Founder
founders.description: Omar is the Founder and CEO of Nomod. Omar previously founded and exited JadoPado, a highly regarded MENA e-commerce technology platform, to Noon.com in 2017. Omar has a BsC in Electronics Engineering and Business Studies from the University of Warwick, UK

# The payment links platform to sell anything, anywhere
Let your customers pay online or in-person using payment links, QR codes, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and process cards from all major card networks
[GET STARTED](https://nomod.com/<https:/dashboard.nomod.com/en/signin/>)
![Competitive Pricing](https://nomod.com/images/cheap-pricing.svg)
Hyper-Competitive Pricing
Transparent, easy to understand, and zero commitment
![Two Day Payouts](https://nomod.com/images/two-day-payouts.svg)
Two Day Payouts
Get paid fast, improve cashflow, and grow your business faster
![Get Started Fast](https://nomod.com/images/get-started-fast.svg)
Get Started Fast
Sign up in a few seconds, and run your first charge in a few minutes
## You do the business, we'll handle the money
Everything you need to sell anything, process card payments, and grow your business anywhere on the planet, minus the headache of dealing with clunky hardware, messy contracts, and unkept promises

## Trusted by 18,687 incredible merchants in the UAE
## Designed for the next billion businesses
Beautifully easy to use software to accept card payments on your phone, and grow your business anywhere on the planet

generated_description:
**Nomod: Revolutionizing Payments Globally**

Founded in 2019 and based in London, Nomod has quickly positioned itself as a key player in the fintech space, specifically focusing on payment solutions. Part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Nomod aims to provide merchants with a seamless way to process payments anywhere, anytime—whether online, in-person, or through mobile devices. 

### Mission
Nomod's mission is clear: to enable businesses to sell anything and accept payments anywhere through user-friendly payment links.

### Solution Overview
Nomod replaces traditional card terminals with a financial services software solution that operates solely through smartphones—no extra hardware is necessary. This approach allows merchants to accept payments using their iOS or Android devices, which is not only more convenient but also scalable across diverse business verticals and geographical locations. 

### Key Features
Nomod offers a myriad of features designed to simplify payment processing for merchants:
- **Payment Links**: Create easy-to-share links for online payments.
- **Multi-Currency Support**: Accept payments in over 135 currencies, letting customers pay in their native currency.
- **In-Person Payments**: Use tap-to-pay technology or simply scan cards to process transactions.
- **Two-Day Payouts**: Quick access to funds, improving cash flow.
- **Team Functionality**: Allow multiple team members to process transactions via their phones.
- **Seamless Reporting**: Monitor transactions and manage customer relationships effortlessly.

### Team and Leadership
Nomod operates with a compact yet effective team of 25 people, showcasing an agile structure that can adapt quickly to market needs. The company is supported by Group Partner Brad Flora, whose insights and guidance are instrumental in its growth.

### Target Industries
Nomod serves a broad range of industries, including:
- **Retail**
- **Food & Beverage**
- **Healthcare**
- **Beauty & Wellness**
- **Events**
- **Travel**

This versatility underscores Nomod’s ability to cater to various business types, from a local café to a large event management company.

### Competitive Edge
Nomod stands out in the crowded fintech landscape with its hyper-competitive pricing model, straightforward user interface, and fast onboarding process. It emphasizes a commitment to transparency, ensuring users understand their costs without hidden fees.

### Conclusion
Nomod is positioned to disrupt traditional payment systems by providing adaptable, smartphone-based solutions that empower merchants to thrive in an increasingly digital economy. With its innovative approach, Nomod is ready to capture the next billion businesses, proving that technology can simplify the complexities of payment processing.
